trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing" /> .

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> evento para executar a inicialização personalizada do controle de edição quando uma célula entra em modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar as características de exibição do controle, defina as propriedades do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> propriedade em vez de definir as propriedades do controle retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra como lidar com esse evento para alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> propriedade da célula atual.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event is associated with the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole o código em um formulário que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `dataGridView1` e certifique-se de que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> evento está associado ao manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> in which the user will edit the selected cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> no qual o usuário editará o conteúdo da célula selecionada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> que representa o estilo da célula que está sendo editada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell style of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de célula da célula editada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> que representa o estilo da célula que está sendo editada.

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar as características de exibição do controle, defina as propriedades do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> propriedade em vez de definir as propriedades do controle retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra como lidar com esse evento para alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> propriedade da célula atual.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event is associated with the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole o código em um formulário que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `dataGridView1` e certifique-se de que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> evento está associado ao manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado ao definir essa propriedade é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The control shown to the user for editing the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: O controle mostrado ao usuário para editar o valor da célula selecionada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that displays an area for the user to enter or change the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que exibe uma área para que o usuário insira ou altere o valor da célula selecionada.

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar as características de exibição do controle, defina as propriedades do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> propriedade em vez de definir as propriedades do controle retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In the example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler adds a handler for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing?displayProperty=nameWithType> manipulador de eventos adiciona um manipulador para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The editing control is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: O controle de edição é convertido em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> para lidar com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.
